title: Chapter IV - Appeals And Other Proceedings Before the Commissioner
content:
Chapter IV - Appeals And Other Proceedings Before the Commissioner

State Regulations

Part 275 - Parties And Pleadings (§ 275.1 to 275.18)

Part 276 - RULES OF PRACTICE (§ 276.1 to 276.12 to 276.14)

Part 277 - Practice On Application For Removal Of School Officers (§ 277.1 to 277.3)

Part 278 - Practice On School District Reorganization Hearings (§ 278.1)

Part 279 - Practice On Review Of Hearings For Students With Disabilities (§ 279.1 to 279.15)

Part 280 - Overlapping State And Federal Requirements (§ 280.1 to 280.2)

Part 281 - Appeals To Commissioner Pursuant To Education Law Section 3020(3) (§ 281.1 to 281.11)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
